ygData.subject: Get Me Out!

X-OriginalArrivalTime: 20 Sep 2000 12:52:25.0482 (UTC) FILETIME=[A020D6A0:01C02301]
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>


* BrightBlade growled, it had been over two mega-cycles that she had been 
left in this stupid CR chamber and she was getting sick of it, comolepely 
sick!
She looked around in the darkness, suddenly smiling to herself as she 
reached into her leg compartment and felt something touch her hand...her 
escape kit!
One that she had cleaverly crafted over the years, learning from her 
mistakes and perfecting it.
She lifted the hand sized kit from her compartment and opened the small 
metal lid silently, a soft red glow coming from within.
BrightBlade kneeled down inside the chamber and looked at what her kit held: 
Parts to make a small...yet powerful hand phaser, welding devises to get rid 
of pesty cell bars, an extra charge for the phaser, a few nano-cloaking 
devices which were charged and ready to use, and a few other odds and ends.
This would be perfect, and she wouldn't have to stay in this dump for much 
longer.
But, first things were first...the phaser.
While keeping her scanners on full, BrightBlade sat down cross-legged and 
began to assamble the gun, each piece being fit into it's right place and 
the charge gaining power once put into it's slot.
It wasn't long before she held a rather impressive piece of hardware, 
something that would give the Maximals a nasty surprise!
Second, was the cloaking device, one to her benifit...and two others for 
emergancies.
BrightBlade then closed her kit after removing the devices, placing one on 
herself and activating it.
Then, she basically disappeared into thin air, not even her signature being 
able to be detected with that baby!
BrightBlade smiled to herself as she put the gun on a hip harnise so that it 
hung at her waist, ready to be used on any Maximal stupid enough to get in 
her way.
Now, it was time to contact Perndabot.
She opened a silant com channel, with a message that would appear on his 
internal screen, not wanting to risk being heard.
This is what it read:*

" Perndabot, I'm in the brig. Get your butt over here and bust a hole in the 
walls or something! I'm already healed and I have a weapon but still need a 
way out. Help me, and I'll make it worth your while. Now, come!"

* So she sent, and then waited. Either to shot a Maximal, or to be saved my 
an Alliance bot. Either suited her just fine.*
